Uses of Class
de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.gdbscan.COPACNeighborPredicate.COPACModel

  • Packages that use COPACNeighborPredicate.COPACModel 
    Package Description
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.gdbscan
    Generalized DBSCAN Generalized DBSCAN is an abstraction of the original DBSCAN idea, that allows the use of arbitrary "neighborhood" and "core point" predicates.
